Name: Abyssal Solvent
AttributesDescription: Increases Echo Skill DMG by 50% for all Resonators in the team for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription:
A solid solvent made using a special process that imparts healing effects.
Allegedly invented by someone after going to Rinascita. Apparently, they really wanted to become a Master Echo Trainer.
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases Echo Skill DMG by 50% for all Resonators in the team for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
